Module._description: Stores results of intermediate processing, such as spike sorting or image segmentation. Each module publishes zero or more interfaces

interfaces._description: List of all interfaces published by the module

neurodata_type._description: Label to identify this group as a neurodata module

description._description: General description of data stored in module and the type of processing done

source._description: Origin of the data represented here. More specific details may be stored in the module interfaces
